articles.title: Bachelor: Rachael Kirkconnell Promotes Black-Owned Business After Matt James Breakup
articles.description: Rachael Kirkconnell has returned to normal programming on Instagram, promoting sponsored content while continuing to stand against injustice.
articles.content: Rachael Kirkconnell is trying to distance herself from the controversy that swirled around her on The Bachelor, promoting brands on Instagram while continuing to stand up against injustice. She clearly wants to take advantage of her showing on the po... [2930 chars]

articles.title: Why Black-Owned Record Stores Are Hard to Find Amid Vinyl-Sales Boom
articles.description: The number of Black-owned record stores shrank from hundreds in the '60s to a fraction of that today. Meanwhile, vinyl is now the No. 1-selling pure-album format in the US.
articles.content: In the '60s and '70s, there were as many as a thousand Black-owned record stores in the South alone.Today, only a fraction of the US's 2,500 record stores are owned by Black businesspeople.Black shop owners say a lack of product is the main difficu... [13386 chars]

articles.title: Megan Thee Stallion Gives An Update On Her Hair Journey After Trying This Black-Owned Brand
articles.description: Megan recently partnered with Mielle Organics after asking her followers to drop Black-owned hair-care brands this past December.
articles.content: As we enter Spring and work seemingly returns to normal (depending on where you live), most are preparing for what a fruitful year may look like. And Grammy-award winning rapper Megan The Stallion is doing the same.On Instagram this week, the “Body”... [887 chars]

articles.title: R/GA Ventures announces its new Coalition Venture Studio to support Black founders
articles.description: Design and marketing consultancy R/GA is expanding its Venture Studios program with the launch of a new Coalition Venture Studio focused specifically on supporting Black-led and Black-owned startups. The initiative is led by R/GA Entrepreneur in Residence Davyeon Ross, a Black entrepreneur who founded sports analytics company ShotTracker. The startup (which is backed by TechCrunch’s […]

articles.description: ESSENCE has created a list of Black owned beauty brands just for you as you transition your beauty and self-care routine into the spring!

articles.title: New alliance aims to lift up Black-owned businesses in Metro Detroit
articles.description: Black-owned businesses often face unique challenges getting off the ground.
articles.content: DETROIT – Black-owned businesses often face unique challenges getting off the ground.A group of business owners are banding together to face those challenges head-on. They’re doing it with a $1 million commitment from TCF Bank.“We’re here to change... [1617 chars]
